Key Match Events: New York Knicks defeated Charlotte Hornets 111-109 in their preseason game on Oct. 16, 2024
Pre-Game Insights: The New York Knicks entered the game with a strong 3-0 preseason record after defeating the Charlotte Hornets on Oct. 6 and the Washington Wizards on Oct. 9. Jalen Brunson, the Knicks' All-Star guard, was rested for the game but had shown strong performances in previous games, including 24 points against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Oct. 13.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jalen Brunson was healthy but did not play in the game against the Charlotte Hornets, as he was rested by the Knicks' coaching staff.
